title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: American History X
production_studio: New Line Cinema, The Turman-Morrissey Company
description: A former neo-Nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: Shakespeare in Love
production_studio: Miramax, Universal Pictures, Bedford Falls Productions
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
Best Music, Original Musical or Comedy Score
description: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: The Big Lebowski
production_studio: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Working Title Films
description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: Life Is Beautiful
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
production_studio: SKA Films, The Steve Tisch Company
description: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard-core debt collectors, loan sharks and mobsters to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

title: Armageddon
description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

title: The Thin Red Line
description: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Identical twins separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their parents back together.

title: Rushmore
description: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation, and then falls in love with a teacher, leading to a war between him and a wealthy industrialist.

title: The X Files
description: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

title: Blade
description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

title: Pi
production_studio: Protozoa Pictures, Truth and Soul Pictures
description: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

title: Pleasantville
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Larger Than Life Productions
description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

title: A Bug's Life
production_studio: Pixar Animation Studios, Walt Disney Pictures
description: A misfit ant, looking for 'warriors' to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bungling circus bugs.

title: The Wedding Singer
description: In 1985, a wedding singer and a waitress are both engaged to the wrong people, but they fall for each other.

title: There's Something About Mary
description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

title: Enemy of the State
description: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

title: You've Got Mail
description: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

title: Dark City
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Mystery Clock Cinema
description: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a dark city with no sun, which is run by beings with telekinetic powers who seek the souls of humans.

title: Mulan
description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: The Mask of Zorro
description: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the original Zorro and prepares to take on the mantle of the legendary hero.

title: Pi
production_studio: Protozoa Pictures, Truth and Soul Pictures
description: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

title: Out of Sight
description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

title: Run Lola Run
description: After a botched money delivery, a young woman has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: Rush Hour
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Roger Birnbaum Productions
description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

title: The Negotiator
description: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: A Simple Plan
description: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across a crashed plane containing $4.4 million in cash and decide to keep it, but their plan goes horribly wrong.

title: A Civil Action
description: A tenacious lawyer takes on a case involving a polluting tannery.

title: Enemy of the State
description: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

title: Out of Sight
description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

title: Ronin
description: A freelancing former U.S. intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

title: The Mask of Zorro
description: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the original Zorro and prepares to take on the mantle of the legendary hero.

title: Patch Adams
description: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter 'Patch' Adams, who determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humor and pathos.

title: The Prince of Egypt

director.name: Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner, Simon Wells

description: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
description: The classic fairy tale of Cinderella is given a new twist in this romantic drama.

title: Deep Impact
description: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.
